name: VibeCoding
description: What is the project about? $VICO is a decentralized meme protocol that turns "vibe coding" — the AI era's no-code movement — into a self-sustaining crypto economy. Using ShellAgent's conversational AI and MCP's modular code frameworks, we let anyone describe ideas in plain language, auto-generate executable code, and earn/burn tokens through community-driven creativity. No bosses, no VCs: just vibes, code, and a deflationary supply fueled by every AI-built line.
